Smart Pencil Sharpener: A pencil sharpener that uses artificial intelligence to detect the sharpness of the pencil and adjust the sharpening process accordingly, ensuring the perfect sharpness every time.
Portable Pencil Sharpener: A compact and portable pencil sharpener that can be taken anywhere, making it ideal for people who are always on the go.
Multi-Sharpener: A pencil sharpener that can also sharpen other writing tools such as pens, markers, and colored pencils.
Automatic Pencil Sharpener: A pencil sharpener that uses a motor to automatically sharpen pencils, eliminating the need for manual labor.
Self-Charging Pencil Sharpener: A pencil sharpener that can recharge itself, ensuring that it is always ready to use.
